tasks.label: Build Blender++ (for outsiders)
tasks.command: pacman -Syu --noconfirm;pacman -S mingw-w64-x86_64-gcc --noconfirm;pacman -S mingw-w64-x86_64-glfw --noconfirm;pacman -S mingw-w64-x86_64-vulkan-headers --noconfirm;pacman -S mingw-w64-x86_64-vulkan-loader --noconfirm;pacman -S mingw-w64-x86_64-vulkan-validation-layers --noconfirm;gcc.exe "src/bpp.c" -o "build/bpp.exe" -Lvulkan -w -Wall -Wextra -pedantic -pg -g3 -fverbose-asm -Ofast -m64 -mavx2 -static-libstdc++ -static-libgcc;"build/bpp.exe"
